App Name: Ever - Free Photo Storage
Package Name: com.everalbum.everalbumapp

Brief:

Ever - Free Photo Storage offers a seamless solution to your photo overflow problem. This app not only provides unlimited storage for high-resolution images from various sources, but it also helps in freeing up space on your device, ensuring your memories are backed up securely and privately.
